channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- BeaconMedÃ¦s TotalAlert Scroll Medical Air Systems web application

item.title: CVE-2018-7518|2024-08-05T06:31:04.252Z -- ics-cert -- beaconmed%26%23195%3B%26%23166%3Bs%20totalalert%20scroll%20medical%20air%20systems%20web%20application
item.description: In TotalAlert Web Application in BeaconMedaes Scroll Medical Air Systems prior to v4107600010.23, an attacker with network access to the integrated web server could retrieve default or user defined credentials stored and transmitted in an insecure manner.

item.title: CVE-2018-7515|2024-08-05T06:31:04.117Z -- ics-cert -- beaconmed%26%23195%3B%26%23166%3Bs%20totalalert%20scroll%20medical%20air%20systems%20web%20application
item.description: In Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.30 and prior, access of uninitialized pointer vulnerabilities can be exploited when CX Supervisor indirectly calls an initialized pointer when parsing malformed packets.
